edu.ucla.sspace.common
Class Statistics

java.lang.Object
  edu.ucla.sspace.common.Statistics

public class Statistics
extends Object

A collection of static methods for statistical analysis.

randomDistribution

public static BitSet randomDistribution(int valuesToSet,
                                        int range)
Randomly sets valuesToSet values to true for a sequence from [0:range).

Parameters:
valuesToSet - the number of values that are to be set to true in the distribution
range - the total number of values in the sequence.
